      • addCustomParameter

        public CommandHandler.Builder addCustomParameter(java.lang.Object instance)
        Add a custom method parameter to the execute method for commands which are registered to this handler. The custom types go after the existing parameters of the execute method in insertion order. 
             example coming soon
        Parameters:
        instance - the parameter instance to be passed

      • addResultHandler

        public <T extends CommandResult> CommandHandler.Builder addResultHandler(java.lang.Class<T> target,
                                                                         TriConsumer<T,LoadedCommand,net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.Message> handle)
        Add a handler for a custom CommandResult. This can handle any CommandResult with the exception of the included results which cannot be edited.
        Parameters:
        target - the CommandResult to handle
        handle - the result handler

      • setConcurrent

        public CommandHandler.Builder setConcurrent(boolean concurrent)
        Set whether the handler should execute commands concurrently.
        Parameters:
        concurrent - whether to execute concurrently

      • setGenerateHelp

        public CommandHandler.Builder setGenerateHelp(boolean generate)
        Set whether to automatically generate a help command based on the registered Commands. The help command will be generated using the HelpCommand.
        Parameters:
        generate - whether to generate a help command

      • setEntriesPerHelpPage

        public CommandHandler.Builder setEntriesPerHelpPage(int entries)
        Set the number of entries (commands) on each page of the generated help menu. This will be ignored if generateHelp = false.
        Parameters:
        entries - the number of entries per page

        public CommandHandler.Builder setUsePermissionsInHelp(boolean usePermissionsInHelp)
